attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown has blundered from one disaster to another & is currently on holiday whilst Food prices and energy spiral. Gas prices rose another 20% & Electrity another 17% yeasterday

His only response has been "that we understand" I dont want a Prime Minsiter who understands, I want one who acts. 

Anyone who agrees he has been a disaster should encourage him to do the decent thing and RESIGN!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
